original_sentence: environment pollution is the mixing of harmful pollutants into the environment causing disturbance to the natural processes and cycles . various types of environmental pollution are categorized as water pollution , air pollution , land pollution and noise pollution . since last decade , there is a great increase in the level of pollution and scenario has become worse than earlier . it is the time to fight pollution and save our ecosystem from its effects . all the natural gases in the environment make their balance by reacting each other . some of them are used as a food by the plants and trees like carbon dioxide . but , just imagine what will happen when there will be no plants and vegetation . decreasing number of plants and trees causes less use of carbon dioxide which gets concentrated into the environment and in turn increases environmental temperature level leading to global warming which is the epicenter of problems . pollution has become a major challenge in the current time and needs to be checked now before it takes the face of a monster . we can definitely prevent pollution by the below given measures : reforestation or planting more trees is one of the best methods to fight pollution . the more we plant trees the more carbon dioxide and other harmful gases get absorbed from the environment making the air clean .

original_sentence: environment pollution is the mixing of harmful pollutants into the environment causing disturbance to the natural processes and cycles . various types of environmental pollution are categorized as water pollution , air pollution , land pollution and noise pollution . since last decade , there is a great increase in the level of pollution and scenario has become worse than earlier . it is the time to fight pollution and save our ecosystem from its effects . all the natural gases in the environment make their balance by reacting each other . some of them are used as a food by the plants and trees like carbon dioxide . but , just imagine what will happen when there will be no plants and vegetation . decreasing number of plants and trees causes less use of carbon dioxide which gets concentrated into the environment and in turn increases environmental temperature level leading to global warming which is the epicenter of problems . pollution has become a major challenge in the current time and needs to be checked now before it takes the face of a monster . we can definitely prevent pollution by the below given measures : reforestation or planting more trees is one of the best methods to fight pollution . the more we plant trees the more carbon dioxide and other harmful gases get absorbed from the environment making the air clean .

original_sentence: environment pollution is the mixing of harmful pollutants into the environment causing disturbance to the natural processes and cycles . various types of environmental pollution are categorized as water pollution , air pollution , land pollution and noise pollution . since last decade , there is a great increase in the level of pollution and scenario has become worse than earlier . it is the time to fight pollution and save our ecosystem from its effects . all the natural gases in the environment make their balance by reacting each other . some of them are used as a food by the plants and trees like carbon dioxide . but , just imagine what will happen when there will be no plants and vegetation . decreasing number of plants and trees causes less use of carbon dioxide which gets concentrated into the environment and in turn increases environmental temperature level leading to global warming which is the epicenter of problems . pollution has become a major challenge in the current time and needs to be checked now before it takes the face of a monster . we can definitely prevent pollution by the below given measures : reforestation or planting more trees is one of the best methods to fight pollution . the more we plant trees the more carbon dioxide and other harmful gases get absorbed from the environment making the air clean .

original_sentence: environment pollution is the mixing of harmful pollutants into the environment causing disturbance to the natural processes and cycles . various types of environmental pollution are categorized as water pollution , air pollution , land pollution and noise pollution . since last decade , there is a great increase in the level of pollution and scenario has become worse than earlier . it is the time to fight pollution and save our ecosystem from its effects . all the natural gases in the environment make their balance by reacting each other . some of them are used as a food by the plants and trees like carbon dioxide . but , just imagine what will happen when there will be no plants and vegetation . decreasing number of plants and trees causes less use of carbon dioxide which gets concentrated into the environment and in turn increases environmental temperature level leading to global warming which is the epicenter of problems . pollution has become a major challenge in the current time and needs to be checked now before it takes the face of a monster . we can definitely prevent pollution by the below given measures : reforestation or planting more trees is one of the best methods to fight pollution . the more we plant trees the more carbon dioxide and other harmful gases get absorbed from the environment making the air clean .
